Achievements.Name: Time to reload
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Cadet difficulty

Achievements.Name: Regular soldier
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Marksman difficulty

Achievements.Name: Hard as nails
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Sniper Elite difficulty

Achievements.Name: True sniper
Achievements.Description: Complete the game on Authentic difficulty

Achievements.Name: Casual Reader
Achievements.Description: Find half of the war diaries

Achievements.Name: Dedicated soldier
Achievements.Description: Complete 100% of the campaign on any difficulty

Achievements.Name: You'll try anything once
Achievements.Description: Play 1 mission in each mode (campaign, challenges, competitive multiplayer)

Achievements.Name: Ghost of Tobruk
Achievements.Description: Clear the mountain pass without alerting the enemy (Mission 1)

Achievements.Name: Well, well, well
Achievements.Description: Hide a body in each of the wells in Gaberoun (Mission 2)

Achievements.Name: End of the 'lein'
Achievements.Description: Found and killed the visiting General (Mission 3)

Achievements.Name: I Fort this would be difficult
Achievements.Description: Get to the informant without being spotted (Mission 4)

Achievements.Name: I Siwa you did there
Achievements.Description: Made the target officer's death look like an accident (Mission 5)

Achievements.Name: Double tap
Achievements.Description: Incapacitate 2 vehicles in Kasserine Pass within 5 seconds (Mission 6)

Achievements.Name: Three birds, one stone
Achievements.Description: Destroyed all 3 bomb dumps at the same time (Mission 7)

Achievements.Name: Long way down
Achievements.Description: Thrown an enemy off one of the bridges (Mission 8)

Achievements.Name: Officer material
Achievements.Description: Attain a rank of Second Lieutenant (level 31)

Achievements.Name: Through the looking glass
Achievements.Description: Kill 10 snipers before they see/shoot you

Achievements.Name: Hidden and dangerous
Achievements.Description: Complete a campaign mission without being seen (excluding Tobruk)

Achievements.Name: A few of my favourite things
Achievements.Description: Get a kill with each offensive item

Achievements.Name: Tactical distractor
Achievements.Description: Distract 20 enemies with flint or rocks

Achievements.Name: Double the distance
Achievements.Description: Snipe enemies over a cumulative distance of a double marathon

Achievements.Name: Highly decorated
Achievements.Description: Earn 1 of every ribbon in competitive multiplayer

Achievements.Name: Indestructible
Achievements.Description: Complete a mission after losing over 500 units of health

Achievements.Name: Charlie's Challenge
Achievements.Description: Get a testicle-shot from over 100m away
